content.text: (FB 742) Updated Release notes now contain case number.
(FB 797) Versions are collected from HBSS, finding is not a bug.
(FB 806) Resolved an issue where HIPS and ACCM for SunOS would not display all the time. RMK is displayin HIPS and ACCM compliance for SunOs correctly.
(FB 628) RMK has updated retention policies for HBSS vulnerability findings. Old vulnerabilities are no longer reported however, they are not deleted.
(FB 746) RMK has updated retention policies for ACAS Plugin Failure Results. RMK pulls the latest ACAS API results and cleans up old findings using Failed Findings Validation Job.
(FB 807) RMK now displays all HBC Components in the HBC Tab.
(FB 828) RMK now uses Failed Findings Validation Job to manage retention.
